snippet.title: Hordes of Hunger Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Hyperstrange shared a gameplay trailer for Hordes of Hunger, an Unreal Engine 5 survivors-like where you fend off cosmic horrors in reactive environments. It’s coming soon to PC.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #hordesofhunger
